text: 7:9-10 Ofa Gami 18:5; Esekiel 20:11-13; 20:21; Rom 10:5; 2 Korin 3:7; Jems 1:15Fomɨra Moses Osirizir Araziba itir puvatɨzɨ, kɨ angamɨra iti. Ezɨ Moses Osirizir Araziba otozɨ, arazir kuraba dɨkavigha angamɨra iti kɨ fo, kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn areme. Moses Osirizir Arazibar ingangarimra kara, a ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim e ganɨdi. Kɨ Moses Osirizir Arazibar tuavimɨn, ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim inizir pu. Puvatɨ. Da na gamizɨ, kɨ areme.
